entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. Temperature steady near plus 3.
